verses.verse: And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H4729><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon: of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

A cubit <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof; foursquare <S%H7251><s%> <S%H8803><s%> shall it be: and two cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof: the shofars <S%H7161><s%> thereof shall be of the same.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, the top <S%H1406><s%> thereof, and the sides <S%H7023><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the shofars <S%H7161><s%> thereof; and thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to it under the crown <S%H2213><s%> of it, by the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H6763><s%> thereof, upon the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6654><s%> of it shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; and they shall be for places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it withal <S%H1992><s%>.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%> that is by the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> that is over the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with thee.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thereon sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>: when he dresseht <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%>, he shall burn incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon it.

And when Aharon <S%H175><s%> lighteth <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the Menorahs <S%H5216><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, he shall burn incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon it, a perpetual <S%H8548><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Ye shall offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> no strange <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, nor burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, nor meat offering <S%H4503><s%>; neither shall ye pour <S%H5258><s%> <S%H8799><s%> drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thereon.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of it once <S%H259><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> of atonements <S%H3725><s%>: once <S%H259><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall he make atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon it throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

When thou takest <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> after their number <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, then shall they give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for his soul <S%H5315><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, when thou numberest <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them; that there be no plague <S%H5063><s%> among them, when thou numberest <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.

This they shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, every one that passeht <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>: (a shekel <S%H8255><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>:) an half <S%H4276><s%> shekel <S%H8255><s%> shall be the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Havahry one that passeht <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and above <S%H4605><s%>, shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

The rich <S%H6223><s%> shall not give more <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and the poor <S%H1800><s%> shall not give less <S%H4591><s%> <S%H8686><s%> than half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%>, when they give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the atonement <S%H3725><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and shalt appoint <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>; that it may be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thou shalt also make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a laver <S%H3595><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and his foot <S%H3653><s%> also of brass <S%H5178><s%>, to wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8800><s%> withal: and thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it between the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein.
For Aharon <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> thereat:

When they go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; or when they come near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, to burn offering <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8687><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

So they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: and it shall be a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> to them, even to him and to his seed <S%H2233><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Moreover the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou also unto thee principal <S%H7218><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%>, of pure <S%H1865><s%> myrrh <S%H4753><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels, and of sweet <S%H1314><s%> cinnamon <S%H7076><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> so much <S%H4276><s%>, even two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels, and of sweet <S%H1314><s%> calamus <S%H7070><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels,

And of cassia <S%H6916><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%>:

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it an oil <S%H8081><s%> of holy <S%H6944><s%> ointment <S%H4888><s%>, an ointment <S%H7545><s%> compound <S%H4842><s%> after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary <S%H7543><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: it shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.
And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> therewith, and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>,
And the table <S%H7979><s%> and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> and his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>,
And the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> with all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>.

And thou shalt sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, that they may be most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>: whatsoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them shall be holy <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, that they may minister unto me in the Kohen's office <S%H3547><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> unto me throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Upon man's <S%H120><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall it not be poured <S%H3251><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any other like it, after the composition <S%H4971><s%> of it: it is holy <S%H6944><s%>, and it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> unto you.

Whosoever <S%H834><s%> <S%H376><s%> compoundeth <S%H7543><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any like it, or whosoever putteth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any of it upon a stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, shall even be cut <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> off from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto thee sweet spices <S%H5561><s%>, stacte <S%H5198><s%>, and onycha <S%H7827><s%>, and galbanum <S%H2464><s%>; these sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H5561><s%> with pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%>: of each <S%H905><s%> shall there be a like <S%H905><s%> weight:

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it a perfume <S%H7004><s%>, a confection <S%H7545><s%> after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary <S%H7543><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, tempered <S%H4414><s%> <S%H8794><s%> together, pure <S%H2889><s%> and holy <S%H6944><s%>:

And thou shalt beat <S%H7833><s%> <S%H8804><s%> some of it very small <S%H1854><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of it before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with thee: it shall be unto you most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And as for the perfume <S%H7004><s%> which thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, ye shall not make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to yourselves according to the composition <S%H4971><s%> thereof: it shall be unto thee holy <S%H6944><s%> for the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Whosoever <S%H834><s%> <S%H376><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like unto that, to smell <S%H7306><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thereto, shall even be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
